column5: I was like Bill last night,could get a good sleep tassing and turning in the antisapation of the turkey opener this morning.Up at 3:30,grab a cup of java and off I was.I was surprised how loud the bush was this morning with all types of birds singing and chirping.I got myself all set in the same area I shot my first bird last year.Siting there waiting as daylight was just breaking,I get a glimps of movement on the trees edge.Two deer coming out for thier moring breakfast.Qualities not the best,but you can see them.
Good luck at getting your bird. I won't be able to get out until Friday morning. My Brother got one this morning, 7 yard shot.
Cool videos Brian  You think the deers spooked the birds??  It just a matter of time.... good luck Jacques
Saw a nice big Tom at 7:40 this morning !!!
was wondering how you did today . You coulda wore your shorts with this mild weather  TB
Yes Wayne,I,ll be up in the AM. Turkey bacon and eggs over easy please.See ya around 5am.
Not a chance Jacques. The deer were very cool this morning.The wind was in my favor,thats why that deer couldnt figure out what was happening.LOL  Thanks
Yah.. well be QUIET !. Tom's still doing their dance in the mornings over by the windsock. Remember... no holes in da airplanes...
It will be dark, where is that from the model planes.LOL
They'z doin their thing right in front of the two war birds tied down beside the sock.
I,ll just sit on the wings then LOL

No problem... steps are on the left side (tire.. step.. hand hold in center of windshield.. step up.. onto bracket on nose.. bracket on roof and onto wing.... stay inside the red lines.. you can walk on those ones.

Got into my blind at 4:45, all was quiet until about 7:00 then I had a hen come out, I saw another bird behind her at the edge of the bush but it went back in. Couldn't tell what it was. the hen stuck around for about 20 minutes or so and got to within about 15 yards of me. She started to wander away so I tried calling, next thing I know there is a shot about 100 yards away from me, one of the other guys shot a nice jake, it was heading in my direction but happened to go past him. That was the end of my morning and excitement, I had to be to work by 8:00.Oh well, there will be more days to hunt.
Good luck Cliff.They sure are fun to watch eh.
I txted my buddy saying goodluck around 9am and 5 minutes later he said he replied saying he was already at home with a harvest. :|
